name: Potato Soup for Busy People
author: NANCIG
summary: I made this potato soup with items I had on hand at home one day after work. It cooks in just 35 minutes.
ingredients: freshly ground black pepper to taste
1 (16 ounce) package frozen cubed hash brown potatoes, thawed
directions: Place bacon in a large skillet and cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned, about 10 minutes
Transfer bacon to a paper towel-lined plate and crumble when cool enough to handle
Discard all but 2 teaspoons bacon drippings from the pan
Add carrot, celery, and onion to the bacon drippings
Saute over medium heat for 2 minutes
Add 1 cup chicken broth, garlic powder, salt, bay leaf, and pepper
Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes
Add potatoes and remaining chicken broth; cook for 10 minutes
Add evaporated milk, increase heat to a simmer, and cook for 5 minutes
Serve with crumbled bacon and grated Asiago cheese
